data.text:
A cloud platform to drive your global growth

Oracle NetSuite ERP

Netsuite is a cloud ERP solution with an integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, project management, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain and warehouse operations. It allows you to lead, grow and transform your business in sync with the speed of change.

Why NetSuite ERP

Netsuite is a cloud ERP solution with an integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, project management, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain and warehouse operations. It allows you to lead, grow and transform your business in sync with the speed of change.

What NetSuite ERP gives you:

A unified platform that integrates various business processes, including financial management, inventory management, order management, CRM, human resources, and more. This all-in-one solution streamlines operations and increases efficiency.

A cloud-based and scalable ERP. Easy access to data from anywhere makes Netsuite the ideal choice for remote and distributed teams. Scalability accommodates the growing needs of businesses as they expand.

Real-time visibility and reporting. Get real-time insights into various aspects of your business, access up-to-date information and make informed decisions quickly. Customisable dashboards and reporting tools enable users to analyse data in a way that suits their specific needs.

Customisation and integration. The SuiteCloud platform allows you to customise and extend the system to meet your unique requirements. It also offers integration capabilities with third-party applications, facilitating seamless data flow across systems.

Global Capabilities. Support for multiple languages, currencies, and tax regulations makes it easier to operate across borders.

Security and compliance. Netsuite’s industry-leading security measures protect data and ensure the privacy and safety of sensitive information. Compliance with various industry standards and regulations gives you peace of mind.

Reduced IT Overhead. As a cloud-based solution, Netsuite eliminates the need for on-premise hardware and software maintenance. This results in lower IT costs and allows your IT team to focus on strategic initiatives rather than routine maintenance tasks.

Moreover, a modern cloud solution can support your customer experience and employee experience. Having your operations centralised, hosted and accessible in the cloud means that your people can access the system anywhere, anytime. You can also integrate third-party systems into your ERP.
